title: Student login and access Student Dashboard
description: Verify that a student can log in successfully and access the Student Dashboard showing courses, intakes, and section details.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid student credentials
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and Student Dashboard is displayed
Verify courses, intakes, and section details are correctly listed

title: Student login failure with invalid credentials
description: Check that login fails with incorrect username or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails and an error message is displayed

title: Admin login and access Admin Dashboard
description: Verify that an administrator can log in and access the Admin Dashboard with modals for managing courses, materials, and notices.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid administrator credentials
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and Admin Dashboard is displayed
Verify modals for adding and managing courses, materials, and notices are accessible

title: Admin adds a new course successfully
description: Verify admin can add a new course using modal workflow and the course is persisted and reflected in the Student Dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open Admin Dashboard
Open the add course modal
Fill in course details correctly
Submit the add course form
Verify course is added in Supabase database
Verify course appears in the Student Dashboard course list

title: Admin uploads study material successfully
description: Verify admin can upload study materials for courses via modal form and files are stored and accessible to students.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open Admin Dashboard
Open upload materials modal
Select course and upload valid material files
Submit the upload form
Verify files are uploaded to Supabase storage and associated with correct course
Verify uploaded materials are visible and accessible in Student Dashboard

title: Global notices display and persistence
description: Verify welcome messages and exam routine images appear globally, persist across user sessions using Supabase and fallback to localStorage.

steps.description: Post a new notice (welcome message or exam routine) via Admin Dashboard
Verify notice appears on all usersâ€™ views globally
Refresh or reopen the application
Verify notices persist and reload correctly from Supabase or fallback to localStorage
Verify embedded exam routine images display properly

title: Semester Tracker live progress and milestones update
description: Verify the semester tracker shows accurate real-time progress bar, phase timeline, countdowns, and milestone information with correct updates.

steps.description: Navigate to the Semester Tracker section
Verify live progress bar updates correctly according to semester dates
Verify timeline phases and milestone countdowns display accurate data
Open full-screen Semester Tracker view
Verify full-screen view displays all semester phases and milestone details

title: Exam Materials Dashboard functionality
description: Verify exam materials are displayed in a centralized dashboard and accessible properly from student view.

steps.description: Navigate to the Exam Materials Dashboard
Verify all relevant study materials are listed accurately
Open an exam material document
Verify the file opens in PDF viewer modal or Google Drive preview

title: Reusable PDF Viewer modal on different devices
description: Verify that the PDF Viewer modal correctly previews PDFs and Google Drive files with fullscreen and mobile responsive previews.

steps.description: Open a PDF file from local storage
Verify PDF renders correctly in modal
Open a Google Drive file link
Verify Google Drive file preview loads correctly in the modal
Switch viewport to mobile device dimensions
Verify PDF Viewer modal adapts its layout responsively and supports fullscreen preview

title: Course and material search and filter accuracy
description: Verify that course and file search and filtering functionality returns relevant and accurate results.

steps.description: Enter keywords in the course search field
Verify only relevant courses matching the keyword are displayed
Apply filters (such as intake, section, or file type) on courses/materials
Verify filtered list matches the selection criteria exactly
Clear search and filters
Verify full list of courses and materials is restored

title: Navigation and view state routing in SPA
description: Verify smooth navigation among views (home, section, course, semester, admin, exam materials) and correct data loading for each.

steps.description: Click navigation links to switch between views
Verify URL and application state update accordingly without full page reload
Verify data for the selected view loads correctly and is displayed
Refresh page on different views
Verify application routes correctly and loads expected data

title: Data persistence and CRUD operations with Supabase
description: Verify all Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations for courses, materials, and notices correctly persist data to Supabase and data integrity is maintained.

steps.description: Create a new course entry via Admin Dashboard
Verify the new course is created in Supabase and visible in front-end
Update course details
Verify updates are persisted and shown correctly
Delete a course
Verify course is removed from Supabase and UI
Perform similar CRUD operations for study materials and notices
Verify all corresponding operations are persisted and reflected with no data loss

title: Responsive UI rendering on desktop, tablet, and mobile
description: Verify that the UI adapts smoothly and renders correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with consistent layout and functionality.

steps.description: Open the application in desktop viewport size
Verify layout, menus, and controls are displayed correctly and usable
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Verify responsive adjustments for layout and controls appear as expected
Resize viewport to mobile phone dimensions
Verify mobile optimized UI including menus and modals displays properly without clipping or overlap

title: Error handling on Supabase CRUD failures
description: Verify the application handles errors gracefully when Supabase CRUD operations fail (e.g. network issues, permission denied).

steps.description: Simulate a Supabase failure during course creation
Verify user receives a clear error message
Simulate failure during file upload
Verify upload failure is gracefully handled with retry option or error notification
Simulate error while loading notices
Verify fallback to localStorage works and user is informed if offline

title: Google Drive files loading and preview validation
description: Verify that Google Drive configuration metadata and folder links load correctly and files are listed and previewed without errors.

steps.description: Load course category with Google Drive folder link
Verify files from Google Drive folder list display correctly
Open a Google Drive file in PDF Viewer modal
Verify Google Drive embedded preview works correctly
Simulate Google Drive file loading failure
Verify user is notified properly and degraded UI behavior handled
